about_the_game:
"Endless Return" is an exciting arcade action game that will immerse you in the world of endless battles and constant returns. In the role of the main character, you will have to travel through various locations, fight with hordes of enemies and pump up your skills.

    About game:



  • 1. Infinite Returns: You will never lose your progress and can always continue your journey. This gives you the freedom and opportunity to explore different approaches to the game.

  • 2. Variety of weapons and abilities: You are given a wide variety of weapons and abilities that can be improved and modified as you progress through the game. This allows you to create your own unique play style and adapt to different situations.

  • 3. Competitive element: "Endless Return" offers the opportunity to compete with other players, achieve high scores and compare your achievements. This adds extra motivation and excitement to the game.

  • 4. Constant development: Every battle in "Endless Return" is an opportunity to improve your skills, weapons and abilities. You are constantly progressing and getting stronger, which makes the game exciting and addictive.

  • 5. Exciting battles: The game offers exciting and dynamic battles with a variety of opponents. You will experience the adrenaline and joy of victory, and immerse yourself in an exciting game world.

    "Endless Return" is a game that offers endless possibilities and constant development. It captivates with its dynamics and exciting battles. Get ready for an exciting journey in the world of "Endless Return" and become a real hero of this endless world.

name: Endless Return

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8, 8.1, 10 x64
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-3240 (2*3400) or equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 7600 GT (512 MB)
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

short_description: Exciting arcade action game where you will fight against hordes of enemies, upgrade your skills, and choose from a variety of weapons and abilities. With each battle you become stronger and unlock new possibilities. Dive into thrilling battles in captivating world of "Endless Return".
